snippet.title: Bring Back God in the Schools (Barron Trump Singing)
snippet.description:
Bring Back God in the Schools

Check us out on Spotify! https://open.spotify.com/album/3y1CZVxPBVqYl2ljdNVWno?si=lLRWLYbeQcuXD9TQDeKi7A

⬇️⬇️⬇️ Watch more videos below! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://youtu.be/WBHJZs8ZeFQ
https://youtu.be/GAdihLnAiXk
https://youtu.be/SZZW8YMZlMg?si=kP7ZE5s5fhhjjpX2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hq_JjAodbY0

Lyrics:
Verse 1:
I’ve walked these halls, I’ve heard them say,
“There’s no room for Him today.”
But I know truth, I know what’s right,
Faith should never leave our sight.

[Verse 2]
They teach the books, they teach the rules,
But what about the golden truth?
Without His love, without His grace,
How can we stand, how can we raise?

[Chorus]
Let’s bring God back to the schools,
Let His wisdom be the rule.
Through the lessons, through the test,
Only faith can bring our best.
With His light, we will stand,
Guided by His mighty hand.

[Verse 3]
A child should know they’re not alone,
That Heaven hears, that they are known.
But when we push His name aside,
We lose the love that lifts us high.

[Verse 4]
A nation strong begins in youth,
Teach them courage, teach them truth.
Let the classroom hear His name,
Let the world not be ashamed.

[Chorus]
Let’s bring God back to the schools,
Let His wisdom be the rule.
Through the lessons, through the test,
Only faith can bring our best.
With His light, we will stand,
Guided by His mighty hand.

[Bridge]
I won’t be silent, I won’t be still,
God belongs here, yes, He will.
From every desk, from every hall,
Let His name be heard by all.

[Chorus]
Let’s bring God back to the schools,
Let His wisdom be the rule.
Through the lessons, through the test,
Only faith can bring our best.
With His light, we will stand,
Guided by His mighty hand.

[Outro]
Raise the banner, lift the sound,
Let His name be all around.
From the classrooms to the halls,
God belongs here, after all.

All content, including references to real individuals, is created for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or deceased, is purely coincidental or used in a satirical, transformative, or fictional context. This content is not intended to defame, embellish, misrepresent, or harm the reputation of any individual. No endorsement or affiliation is implied unless explicitly stated.
